outputFile.description: The relative path to the desired output file name.

inputFile.description: One or more relative file names to bundle.

minify.description: Set to true to minify the output.

includeInProject.description: Set to true to include the output file in the project. Doesn't work in some Visual Studio project types like ASP.NET 5 applications.

sourceMap.description: Set to true to automatically create a .map file. Only works for .scss files.
